Just a cave or something would be fine, Orchid...
  ----- Original Message =
----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, J=
uly 28, 2000 11:40 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  (OOC: Alright. fine=
, Soulstice, just don't go crazy. :-/ *Starts thinking* Why don't you decid=
e?.)
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 8:28 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Bea=
st Wars


    (Damn, Orchid! Is the Beach the only place you know? I though=
t they would go find a nice secluded place and work out their differences! =
Man!)
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
    =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 8:21 PM
      S=
ubject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Infectra nods to Stranato*

      Infec=
tra: I agree with that.




      *Blizzard starts walking for the beach wh=
ile holding Sinister's hand*




      *Twister sits at a table inside the =
base and sits her hands on the table and bangs her head on it and sits ther=
e*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 8:02 PM
        Su=
bject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        "We must do something, the Maximals we =
have never betrayed, we must go to them." Stranato said.

        Sinister =
nodded to Blizard, he held her hand and started to walk to wherever Blizzar=
d wanted to go...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: i=
lovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, J=
uly 28, 2000 5:08 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Bliz=
zard: Hmm...If you think you don't need healing than we shall be off.

    =
      *Blizzard says to Sinister*

          *Twister walks into the base*
=



          Infectra: I don't think we can change the way they act...If we=
 do that they'll just go as before....That doesn't mean we totally shouldn'=
t try it.....*sigh*

          *Infectra says while frowning*
            -=
---- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 5:24 AM
          =
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            Sinesis goes to the CR Chamber =
to get healed.

            "Why when we can go now?" Sinister asked Blizza=
rd.

            "I guess so, now that our friends are gone I don't know wh=
ere we should go." Stranato said to Infectra.

            "We never betray=
ed the Maximals, you think they's want us back?" Airbomber asked.

        =
    "They ignored our talent before, what makes you think it'll be any diff=
erent this time?" Stranato asked.

            "You can fake amnesia." Airb=
omber suggested.

            "It's stupid, but it might work." Stranato sa=
id...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: ilove=
alllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Frida=
y, July 28, 2000 4:58 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      =
        *Infectra looks around and sighs while looking at the ground and th=
e sky and the bushs*

              Infectra: I wonder how'll we'll start..=
.and what we'll eat......

              *Infectra sighs and frowns*



   =
           Blizzard: Yeah!

              *Blizzard says quickly and evilly=
*

              Blizzard: That's perfect. But first you should get into pr=
ime condition. A small trip to the CR Chamber wouldn't hurt, would it?

   =
           *Blizzard says in a nice jolly tone to Sinister*


             =
 Twister: I'll see if I see you...

              *Twister says to Sinesis =
as she gets closer to the Base*

              *Twister looks back at Sines=
is and just stares. Than she looks at Blizzard and Sinister and frowns bari=
ng her teeth and turning away*
                ----- Original Message -----=
 
                From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
              Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 2:05 AM
                Subject: =
Re: Neo Beast Wars


                Stranto sighed. He hoped they weren't =
running along, skipping merrily to their dooms.

                "I hope no=
t, dear." Airbomber said to Infectra.

                Sinister smiled wick=
idly to Blizzard.

                "Like a quiet spot nobody knows about?" =
He asked. Sinesis groaned. He worried about his brother's virginity for a w=
hile...
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  F=
rom: ilovealllizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
           =
       Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 12:18 AM
                  Subject: Re: =
Neo Beast Wars


                  *Blizzard breaks the kiss* (OOC:If it wa=
sn't already broken)

                  Blizzard: Want to go somewhere afte=
r you get healed up?

                  *Blizzard asks Sinister*


        =
          *Twister looks at Blizzard and Sinister and frowns with a big sig=
h. She than stands up walks closer to the Base with her head lowered*


   =
               *Infectra sighs*

                  Infectra: I hope that th=
e wind isn't a tornado.

                  *Infectra closes her optics*

  =
                Infectra: Now where are heading? Which way?

              =
    *Infectra asks Airbomber while pointing her extended finger around*
